name: Burst Samurai (student project / work in progress)
name_original: Burst Samurai (student project / work in progress)
description:
In a Japanese cyberpunk universe, play as a cybernetic samurai seeking for revenge after the loss of his powers.

Offer to the player an nervous, fast paced 2D experience, with a gameplay based on the realization of complex combo, in order to give him a sense of mastery, precision and  fluidity.

(student project / work in progress)
